plugin.name: Showmap
plugin.author: Pwar
plugin.description: This gives you links to external map sites. Highly recommended.

plugin.name: mudbin
plugin.author: Pwar
plugin.description: This lets you copy anything from the main output window, press Ctrl+P, and it will post the contents to http://mudbin.tk/ with the color codes intact, and copy the link to your clipboard for sharing with others.

plugin.name: WinkleGold - Search & Destroy
plugin.author: Pwar
plugin.description: Enhanced version of WinkleWinkle's Search & Destroy script.

plugin.name: WinkleGold - Spellup
plugin.author: Pwar
plugin.description: Uninstall your existing spellup plugin before installing! Enhanced version of WinkleWinkle's Spellup script. This fixes saving of SetClanSn and recasting of some spells/skills. It is a work in progress, feel free to send Pwar notes requesting specific spells/skills that aren't being recasted by the plugin and I will try to fix them.

plugin.name: Inviter
plugin.author: Pwar
plugin.description: Lets you add friends/clan members to a list to auto-invite them to party when they login. Also lets group members use commands via tell/group messages to invite themselves or others.
